response.overview: On the occasion of the completion of 100 years of glorious history and triumphs of Olympiacos, Olympiacos FC, in collaboration with the award-winning film production company from the United Kingdom “Red Mountain Films”, presents the thematic documentary entitled “Olympiacos, The Legend”, about the conquest of the first two European football trophies of our Club.
response.title: Olympiakos,O Thrilos
